forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 62. West southwest wind 8 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 53. West southwest wind 7 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn stretches its gentle light across Downtown San Francisco, the city awakens under a canvas of mostly sunny skies, accented by the cool serenade of the west-southwest winds. The temperature hovers comfortably around 62 degrees, a refreshing embrace for early risers and weekend wanderers alike. The sails of the Golden Gate Bridge stand defiantly against the soft breeze, while the sun pirouettes through patches of cloud, gifting us a day that promises warmth without the Los Angeles glare.

The marine layer has retreated, leaving only whispers of fog along the horizon, particularly around the coastline, as it does in the delicate dance of summer mornings. By evening, a partially cloudy tableau will settle in, dropping to the low 50s, but for now, the day lays out endless possibilities. Embracing layers is advisable; a light jacket over perhaps a simple shirt, ready to shed as the sun casts its warm glow. Strolls through the vibrant streets, a quietly brewed coffee in hand, or perhaps a visit to one of the less-traveled parks can turn an ordinary day into a cherished memory. Thus, find yourself amidst the city's exquisite corners—nature, art, or simply the hum of urban life await your discovery in this emerging warmth.
